Question: This person continued an active career past his 75th birthday, concentrating on his television specials and USO tours.
Hints: For a time this person attended the Boys Industrial School in Lancaster, Ohio.
This person was awarded over two thousand honors and awards, including 54 honorary doctorates.
This person's first short-lived marriage was to his vaudeville partner, Grace Louise Troxell, whom he married in January 1933.
